landingPage.resumeText: Fascinated by computers and their security challenges, I am oriented towards cybersecurity careers. Creative and persistent, I enjoy tackling challenges as a team to address current issues in terms of computer security.

forensics.title: Forensics
forensics.contentText: Solid understanding of basic principles of digital forensics, including data acquisition methods, data analysis, and evidence presentation.

devsecops.title: DevSecOps
devsecops.contentText: Strong understanding of development, computer security, and regulatory compliance. Proficient in CI/CD, network security, and penetration testing.

pentesting.title: Penetration Testing
pentesting.contentText: Penetration testing and common vulnerabilities. Reconnaissance, exploitation, post-exploitation, and reporting. Identifying and fixing vulnerabilities to ensure the security of systems and networks.

development.title: Development
development.contentText: Expertise in Java, Python, C++, JavaScript, Bash, Docker, and more. Advanced use of GitHub for version control and collaboration on personal and professional projects.

aboutMePage.title: WHOAMI
aboutMePage.paragraph_one: Cyberdefense cybersecurity engineer, specialized in CSIRT. Passionate about data protection and computer security, I have expertise in establishing robust security systems for various companies. Skills include penetration testing, regulatory compliance, and incident management. üõ°Ô∏è
aboutMePage.paragraph_two: As a fervent self-hoster, I believe in the need to control one's own data. Specialized in hosting websites, applications, and services, I share my knowledge to encourage digital autonomy. üåê
aboutMePage.paragraph_three: My goal: provide advanced security solutions while facilitating access to technological autonomy for everyone. Let's secure and empower together! üöÄ
